text: Roland Guillon (born 1942) is a French sociologist, Sociologie de l'activité par Roland Guillon known for his work in the areas of employment and capital. He is also known for his innovative approach to jazz. Guillon Roland, Essai sur la formation sociale des œuvres d’art He is a research engineer at the centre of economics and ethics of environment and development of the Université de Versailles Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines. As a specialist in employment and training, he performed several missions in West Africa. Roland Guillon, Sociologue ==References== Category:Versailles Saint-Quentin-en- Yvelines University faculty Category:French sociologists Category:Living people Category:1942 births
title: Roland Guillon
